data.title: Brighton College Explores Music Collaboration with Mahidol University

data.title: CP LAND Wins “Community Initiative Award” at ACES Awards 2024
data.description: C.P. LAND Public Company Limited, a prominent leader in Thailand’s real estate sector, was honoured with the  Community Initiative Award at the Asia’s Corporate Excellence & Sustainability (ACES) Awards 2024 , hosted by MORS Group. This prestigious award recognises organisations for initiatives that benefit communities and promote sustainability at both industry and regional levels.  CP LAND  is the first real estate company in Thailand to receive this accolade for its  “Solar Cell for Life”  project, a model community initiative in  Kiriwong Village, Kam Lon Subdistrict, Lan Saka District, Nakhon Si Thammarat Province.  Focusing   on the quality-of-life enhancement in rural communities through the installation of  solar-powered streetlights  in areas with limited access to electricity. The initiative not only enhances community livelihoods, well-being, and daily road safety but also promotes local tourism and economic activities, as well as alternative sustainable energy usage.

data.title: Siam Paragon’s 19th Anniversary: A Magical Milestone
data.description: Siam Paragon, a name synonymous with luxury and global prestige, marks its 19th anniversary with a dazzling celebration aptly titled “Siam Paragon 19th Anniversary: The Magical Celebration.” Running from December 2 to 10, 2024, the festivities showcase why this iconic destination remains a favourite among Thais and international visitors alike.

data.title: PalFish Opens Second English Learning Centre in Thailand
data.description: PalFish Thailand proudly celebrated the grand opening of its second  PalFish Experience Center  at  Future Park Rangsit  (Campus Park, 3rd Floor, Central Zone) on  3 December 2024.  Designed for children aged 3–15, this state-of-the-art centre offers one-on-one English lessons with native-speaking teachers, supported by cutting-edge technology and interactive applications for a modern, effective learning experience.

data.title: Laurent Perves Appointed CEO of Vacheron Constantin
data.description: Vacheron Constantin is pleased to announce the appointment of Laurent Perves as the Maison’s CEO, effective 1st January 2025. He succeeds Louis Ferla, with whom he has worked closely over the past eight years.

data.title: TCMA Showcases Saraburi Sandbox Progress at COP29
data.description: TCMA showcased the one-year progress of the ‘Saraburi Sandbox’ at COP29, uniting local and global stakeholders to accelerate joint actions by combining policy, technology, funding, and governance to enhance Thailand’s access to green funding towards achieving Net Zero 2050.

data.title: SolarEdge Introduces Three-Phase Solar Solution for Thailand
data.description: SolarEdge Technologies, a global leader in smart energy technology, has announced the availability of its Three-phase SolarEdge Home ecosystem in Thailand. This comprehensive solution is designed to optimise energy savings, storage, and backup capabilities for homeowners, featuring the SolarEdge Home Hub Inverter, SolarEdge Power Optimisers, SolarEdge Home Battery, and SolarEdge Home Backup Interface. The system is managed via the mySolarEdge app, enabling homeowners to monitor, control, and optimise solar production, energy use, and carbon reduction seamlessly.

data.title: Universo Ferrari Debuts in Southeast Asia's Thailand
data.description: Universo Ferrari, an immersive exhibition celebrating the world of Ferrari, has opened its doors in Thailand. This landmark event marks the fourth such exhibition globally, following Italy, Australia, and Korea, and is the first in Southeast Asia.

data.title: Thonburi and Geely Launch First Right-Hand Drive EX5
data.description: Thonburi Group, a leading Thai automotive company, and Geely, a globally recognised innovator in the automotive industry, have announced a strategic partnership to distribute Geely vehicles in Thailand. This collaboration, managed by Thonburi Neustern Co., Ltd., encompasses sales, marketing, and after-sales services, marking a significant milestone in Thailand

data.title: Kindness Launches Sunscreens for Every Lifestyle Need
data.description: Kindness, a Thai beauty brand founded by two visionary entrepreneurs, has unveiled three new Freedom Sunscreen formulas to meet the rising demand for health-conscious, eco-friendly beauty solutions. Known for their Clean Beauty ethos, Kindness products are crafted using advanced innovation to create skincare that is safe, free from irritants, and suitable for sensitive skin, addressing a variety of skincare needs.

data.description: In a delightful blend of street food culture and riverside glamour, the 21st edition of "Raan Dung Ross Ded" transforms Shangri-La Bangkok

data.title: Bangchak Supports Thailand National Junior Tennis Athlete
data.description: Gloyta Nathalang, Senior Executive Vice President of Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited, welcomed 13-year-old “Lookkid” Phasin Sinchalong, a member of the Thailand National Junior Tennis team. Currently residing in France, Lookkid is training at the Mouratoglou Tennis Academy.

data.title: Silver Lining Lounge Reopens with Panoramic Views and Elegance
data.description: Skyview Hotel Bangkok proudly announces the grand reopening of its Silver Lining Lounge, an elevated space for social and corporate events, perched on the 33rd floor with breathtaking views of Bangkok’s skyline and Benjasiri Park.

data.title: IRPC Explores Trade and Tech War Impacts in Special Forum
data.description: IRPC Public Company Limited (IRPC) recently held a high-profile hybrid forum titled  “Direction of Trade War and Tech War after the New U.S. Government” , bringing together distinguished experts and key industry leaders to provide critical insights into the evolving global economic landscape.

data.title: Exclusive Enrollment Opportunity at Brighton College Bangkok, Vibhavadi
data.description: As part of our launch celebration for the new    Vibhavadi campus , Brighton College Bangkok is delighted to offer an exclusive opportunity for pupils joining our vibrant educational community.

data.title: NT and Megabangna Collaborate for Mega Countdown Concert
data.description: National Telecom Public Company Limited (NT), in partnership with Megabangna Shopping Centre, is set to create an extraordinary end-of-year celebration with the highly anticipated  “NT PRESENTS MEGA COUNTDOWN 2025” . The event promises to deliver an unforgettable evening of music, entertainment, and joy under the theme  “A Sonic Journey into Mega Pop City” .
